column4: pici i will be putting my server up at the company I work for (ie. job.com) currently any of the windoze servers are named somename.job.com, where is that during the ubuntu setup? would I have to enter the whole string? bieb.job.com? or just name the server bieb?
um, I'm not sure actually... You may want to ask in #ubuntu-server
If you can run the 64bit live CD, then you've just verified that.
I just wanted to verify that was the best test.. didnt know if there was a command that would tell me the processor
